document_data.caption: A map showing the River Ankhapur flowing out of the Ankhwood.
document_data.name: River Ankhapur
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Ankhapur''' was a small waterway found near the [[Lake of Steam]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Geography: The river originated near the center of the [[Ankhwood]] north of the eastern half of the Lake of Steam. It flowed southwest and west for {{SI|200|mi|k|long=yes}} before emptying into the sea approximately {{SI|50|mi|k|long=yes}} southeast of [[Ankhapur]].
